name: hackathon2-icap-frontend
description: ICAP Survey Platform - Hono + Cloudflare Pages Frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp index.html dist/index.html && cp public/_routes.json dist/_routes.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --branch=staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --branch=main
scripts.types:generate: supabase gen types typescript --project-id qetwmgvlqzevksqnhruz > src/shared/types/supabase.ts
